properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 9:12PM EST until February 8 at 10:54AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Little River near Eatonton affecting Putnam County

Middle Oconee River near Arcade affecting Barrow and Jackson
Counties


...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Alcovy River near High Point affecting Newton County

Big Haynes Creek near Milstead  affecting Newton and Rockdale
Counties

Yellow River near Rocky Plains affecting Newton County

Echeconnee Creek near Byron affecting Bibb...Crawford...Houston
and Peach Counties

Little River near Washington affecting Taliaferro and Wilkes
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Middle Oconee River near Arcade.
* Until Saturday morning.
* At 08PM Friday the stage was 20.8 feet...and falling.
* Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue.
* Flood stage is 16 feet.
* The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by Saturday
morning.
* At 21 feet...Moderate flooding begins. Significant flooding
occurs in the woodlands...fields and pasture upstream and
downstream from the gage at Georgia Highway 82. A residential yard
will be completely flooded with the water reaching the foundation
of a house just downstream. The flood waters will be reaching
Bismarck Circle Road upstream from the gage.
